SPONSORS

SKILLSHARE X CREATIVE PEP TALK
Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE! 

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to https://www.skillshare.com/r/profile/Andy-J.-Pizza/2832678 to get started!!!

 

WIREFRAME PODCAST FROM ADOBE
Wireframe is a podcast for designer’s and design curious creatives.

Whether you’re into UX, UI, technology... or just curious about the way design impacts our everyday lives, check out Adobe’s Wireframe Podcast NOW! https://link.chtbl.com/wireframe?sid=podcast.creativepeptalk

itunes:title: 286 - 3 Lessons From A Career Changing 100 Day Project with Lolly Lolly Ceramics (AKA Lalese Stamps)
itunes:author: Lolly Lolly Ceramics, Alex Sugg, Jordan Aaron, Yoni Wolf, Lalese Stamps, Andy J. Pizza
itunes:summary:
Today on the show we have Lalese Stamps, the ceramicist behind the beautiful mugs and pots of Lolly Lolly Ceramics! Lalese did the most incredible 100 day project posting a new mug everyday day for 100 days. This project put Lalese’s practice on the map and today she comes on the show to share everything that she learned in the process.

Lalese’s work is gorgeous and the sensitivity behind the work that I discovered in this conversation was even more inspirational! If you’re thinking of starting a daily project or need some fresh fire to pour into a project you’re already in the middle of, this episode is for you!

In this episode we cover:

- How 100 Day Projects Unlock Deeper Inspirations
- Why Detaching Yourself from Your Output Can Be Powerful
- The Hidden Ability in Your Senses
- MUCH MORE!
